overview: Besieged by his adoring female fans, radio celebrity Ned "The Fireside Troubadour" Farrar hides out at the home of his wife Queena's imperious Aunt Min. Pretending to be Aunt Min's handyman, he performs his tasks so well that she refuses to let him leave.
tagline: 250,000 ROARING NEW YORKERS CAN'T BE WRONG! The play that panicked Broadway for eight solid laugh-packed months...
title: Her Master's Voice
